events.message: I received the wrong product in my recent order and I want to request a refund immediately as this is not what I ordered.
The customer issue has been categorized under Refund since they mentioned wanting a refund due to receiving the wrong item.
Agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the refund request concerning the incorrect product shipment.
Hello, this is Sarah from customer support. Iâ€™m here to help you with your refund request regarding your recent order.
Could you please provide your order number and a picture of the product you received so I can process the refund quickly?
Sure, my order number is 123456789, and I have attached a photo of the wrong item that was delivered in place of the shoes I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate your refund immediately and send you a prepaid label to return the incorrect product at no cost.
Thanks for the quick response. I appreciate the prepaid label and prompt refund solution you provided.
The refund has been processed successfully, and the prepaid return label was emailed to you. Please use it to send the wrong item back to us.
We wanted to check in and confirm that you received your refund and that everything was resolved to your satisfaction.
We are closing this case now. Please do not hesitate to reach out if you have any further questions or concerns in the future.
